doc.title: How Long Winter Lasts in Romania
doc.plot: "HOW LONG WINTER LASTS IN ROMANIA" is an observational travelogue through contemporary Romanian cities and countryside in wintertime of 2003. Fragments of "Mioritza", the Romanian national ballade intermingles with Jonas Mekas poetic visions. Romania, a land of contrasts, on the promising doorstep of European Union still seems to be in a state of post-communist syndrome. Romania's resemblance to Lithuania intrigues questions and skepticism.
